title: @Meddler/@Scarizard Can we please get a preview of Zyras upcoming changes?
body: As a Zyra main, I was more than excited to hear there are some changes in the works. But apparently they are delayed till 5.18. Can we get a preview/some infos about those changes and what direction you want to go with her please? =)

replies.body:
Current thinking: Zyra's a good candidate for some small work. Let's start by looking at plant AI.

That's as far as we've got, this is work that will be looked into soon, but hasn't yet started.

I just hope/pray you guys do her justice /_\ 

#InMeddlerWeTrust

plz tell me you will do the same for sona, we all know that she suffer from the same problem as zyra. Both are ap reliant and right now tanky supports are way stronger than ap suopports due the superiority of tanky sup itemization.

First of all, thank you for replying the post.
In my opinion, her plants are decent at early level (damage is fine). Later on mid-late game, her plants would die instantly or become useless if being hit by AOE abilities like Miss Fortune E (Make It Rain). So I think that you can buff her plants' health by Zyra's level? or make the plants take at least take some damage from abilities and not die instantly? 
I also like the idea that Zyra gets some movement speed when she is close to her plants. This could be her passive or her W's passive. I think the cool down on her W passive is not that useful and can be remove because I think most Zyra's players max Q first and then E second, then Ultimate, and finally W. This means that you only need to put 1 point in W (2% cd bonus) which later will be max last. So exchanging the CD bonus to movement speed bonus when Zyra is close to her plants should be meaningful in her kit. 
Sorry for my bad English lol. Thank you for reading.

Higher base stats please? She needs more move speed and more hp, other cc mages/bursty mages have higher move speed.

Also can you semi revert the previous nerf and raise her passive CDR to 15% on W. Having 35% with Athenes/Morellos is awkward.

I feel like Zyra's plants should also have some special interaction with bushes, perhaps making them last longer since they'd be in their natural habitat. Tbh I'd love to see what riot could with Zyra now if they were to give her a real champ update like the Juggernauts got.
